Name: CRAFTSMAN
About the game: Craftsman is a game about a cubic world in which you can build anything you want. Explore the location, get resources and indulge in creativity! In this game there is no pre-written plot, you have to create your own story. No one will tell you where to go and what to do, but you will surely understand everything yourself, because this fascinating cubic world is familiar to us all. Feel like a real craftsman! Main Features Open world for exploration Resource management A construction system limited only by your imagination Pleasant visual and sound design This game is a parody.
Meta Title: CRAFTSMAN: Jun 25, 2021, Sweet Games and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on CRAFTSMAN? Check out the release date (Jun 25, 2021), developer insights from Sweet Games, and a complete game summary.
